attributes.action: Stop all parades,republican and loyalist in Northern Ireland except in their own areas
attributes.additional_details: A petition to stop all parades, republican and loyalist in Northern Ireland except in their own areas. We hear time and time again that these parades are part of culture and are not meant to wind up the other community. Well then there should be no problem if they march in their own respective areas where the other community cannot see or hear them.
